routes./>title: WAX Network Monitor and Infrastructure Dashboard
routes./non-compliant-bps>title: Non-compliant Blocks Producers - WAX Network Dashboard
routes./nodes-distribution>title: Geographic Distribution of Nodes - WAX Network Dashboard
routes./accounts>title: Accounts and Contracts - WAX Network Dashboard
routes./block-distribution>title: Block Production Distribution - WAX Network Dashboard
routes./rewards-distribution>moreDescription: A geographic visualization of daily block producer rewards and a list of non-compliant paid block producers.
routes./non-compliant-bps>moreDescription: A list of the paid block producers in the network which do not provide information in their BP.json files.
routes./bpjson>moreDescription: A tool for block producers to provide details of their organizations and nodes to comply with the BP information standard.
routes./node-config>moreDescription: Use this tool to obtain example config files to help configure a new node on the network.
routes./ricardian-contract>moreDescription: The on-chain ricardian contract that describes the validator node agreement of this network.
routes./>moreDescription: Monitor the infrastructure of blockchain networks using Antelope + EOSIO blockchain technology.
routes./cpu-benchmark>moreDescription: A visualization of CPU usage in milliseconds by block producer nodes accounts, with lowest, highest, and average usage data.
routes./block-producers>moreDescription: A list of the block producers in the network â€“ blockchain accounts registered to run nodes on the network. It includes information from chain tables and their bp.json files.
routes./nodes>moreDescription: A list of all the nodes run by block producers comprising the network with specific information such as endpoints and location.
routes./endpoints>moreDescription: An updated list of public API endpoints provided by node operators and their health status.
routes./nodes-distribution>moreDescription: A visualization of the geographic distribution of the nodes in this network.
routes./accounts>moreDescription: This tool helps find information about accounts and interact with contracts on the network. Enter an account name and obtain account information, smart contract actions, and table data.
routes./block-distribution>moreDescription: A visualization of the distribution of blocks produced by the nodes in the network.
routes./missed-blocks>moreDescription: A list of scheduled, produced, and missed blocks by each account in the network.
